pr_title: [CDAP-16406] Fix creating System profile from UI

timeline.bodyText: Could this be consolidated with the previous/first if block?
timeline.author: yukiej

timeline.bodyText: if we are closing the modeless here, is there a need to fetch the runtime args? Can we just do a return; after?
timeline.author: elfenheart

replies.bodyText: So we are closing the pipeline config modeless from here because we only want one to be open (because they are using a component that uses same store). The runtime arguments are the run level arguments. So this will make sure we only close the pipeline config modeless when we open runtime arguments at runlevel.
replies.author: ajainarayanan
